org.libav.audio

Class AudioFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.audio.AudioFrame

  • public class AudioFrame
extends Object
    Audio frame. Holds an array of audio samples and its size in bytes. NOTE: The audio frame may contain more samples than the number of channels.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AudioFrame(byte[] samples, int frameSize, int channelCount, SampleFormat sampleFormat, int sampleRate)
      Create a new audio frame and set the array of audio samples and the frame size.
      AudioFrame(byte[] samples, int channelCount, SampleFormat sampleFormat, int sampleRate)
      Create a new audio frame and set the array of audio samples.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Get number of audio channels.

      Get sample format.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioFrame

        public AudioFrame(byte[] samples,
          int channelCount,
          SampleFormat sampleFormat,
          int sampleRate)
        Create a new audio frame and set the array of audio samples. The size of the new frame is equal to the samples.length.
        Parameters:
        samples - audio samples
        channelCount - number of audio channels
        sampleFormat - a sample format
        sampleRate - sample rate

      • AudioFrame

        public AudioFrame(byte[] samples,
          int frameSize,
          int channelCount,
          SampleFormat sampleFormat,
          int sampleRate)
        Create a new audio frame and set the array of audio samples and the frame size.
        Parameters:
        samples - audio samples
        frameSize - a frame size
        channelCount - number of audio channels
        sampleFormat - a sample format
        sampleRate - sample rate
